document.full_text: pakistan's spy agency on wednesday shrugged off testimony from an american who says he scouted targets for the 2008 mumbai attacks by pakistani militants with the help of at least one pakistani intelligence official.
document.title: pakistan officer shrugs off supposed spy link to mumbai attacks
lines_and_colors: pakistan's spy agency on wednesday shrugged off testimony from an american who says he scouted targets for the 2008 mumbai attacks by pakistani militants with the help of at least one pakistani intelligence official.
